title: 成日講美國好多人死於廢炎嘅人 唔該入一入黎

replies.msg:
https://www.detroitnews.com/story/opinion/2020/09/10/opinion-data-shows-covid-19-virus-risk-not-deadly-we-thought-media-left/5750509002/

呢位 叫 Christina 嘅人寫左篇文 第一段講:
After the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention released an updated report regarding COVID-19 deaths in late August, which showed that only 6% of coronavirus deaths were solely due to the virus, some in the general public went ballistic. And rightfully so.

哇 明明廢炎好恐怖 佢竟然話美國個death count 得6% 係 solely due to the virus
睇下佢個source 先

https://www.cdc.gov/nchs/nvss/vsrr/covid_weekly/index.htm

Under Comorbidities 真係有一句
For 6% of the deaths, COVID-19 was the only cause mentioned.

Note: Comorbidity is the state of having multiple medical conditions at the same time

CDC 係美國嘅 Centre for Disease Control
可唔可信自己諗

總結個意思係 美國篤大數
只要個病人死左 而且有Covid-19 (die with) 都當 死於Covid-19 (die of)
CDC 出埋report 誠實講美國公佈嘅death count 只有6% 係肯定廢炎殺
你都要繼續吹廢炎殺好多人
咁真係無野好講
支那日日都0添吖

陽性但無病徵 = 唔計確診
未確診就死咗 = 唔計
死咗但本身有其他疾病 = 唔計

要一個本身冇病冇痛嘅人喺死前驗到有武肺仲有病徵而死咗先計

任何人陽性/死後驗到陽性, 唔理實際上係咩死因, 都計
